lead_paragraph: Hall of Famer Wayne Gretzky's slap shot was always precise and straight as an arrow. Give archery an assist for that.

headline.print_headline: The Straight Story: Bow and Arrow Advances Lift Other Sports
headline.main: The Straight Story: Bow and Arrow Advances Lift Other Sports

snippet: Hall of Famer Wayne Gretzky's slap shot was always precise and straight as an arrow. Give archery an assist for that....
